picks.text: At least 1 new iPhone ships with USB-C
picks.full-pick-text: At least 1 new iPhone ships with USB-C

picks.text: The Pro iPhones will use titanium instead of stainless steel for the chassis
picks.full-pick-text: The Pro iPhones will use titanium instead of stainless steel for the chassis

picks.text: At least 1 iPhone gets a camera with a more than 3x zoom
picks.full-pick-text: At least 1 iPhone gets a camera with a more than 3x zoom

picks.text: The two Pro phones will have different camera features
picks.full-pick-text: The two Pro phones will have different camera features
picks.notes: • It is agreed not to quibble too much about the name "Pro" if there ends up being something like an Ultra phone.

picks.text: At least 1 of the new iPhones will have a customizable "action" button instead of a traditional mute switch
picks.full-pick-text: At least 1 of the new iPhones will have a customizable "action" button instead of a traditional mute switch
picks.notes: • Again, the name doesn't have to be exactly right, it's the concept.

picks.text: At least 1 iPhone gets a 3 nm processor
picks.full-pick-text: At least 1 iPhone gets a 3 nm processor

picks.text: Apple announces a multi-device charger that looks a lot like AirPower, without designated charging targets
picks.full-pick-text: Apple announces a multi-device charger that looks a lot like AirPower, without designated charging targets
picks.notes: • Stephen came to the table with two picks: "Apple announces a multi-device charger that looks a lot like AirPower" and "The 15 Pro Max weighs within 10% of the 14 Pro Max's weight". Myke believed that a 10% margin on either side is too wide to be risky and also that the AirPower one is just a better risky pick with less math. Once it's settled to go with the AirPower one, Federico asks to clarify "looks like" and the pick is modified to specify a lack of charging targets.

picks.text: At least one of the new iPhones will support the new Qi 2 wireless charging standard...
picks.full-pick-text: At least one of the new iPhones will support the new Qi 2 wireless charging standard, and "reverse wireless charging" for AirPods cases. MagSafe charging speed will also be raised from 15 watts
picks.notes:
• "... and "reverse wireless charging" for AirPods cases. MagSafe charging speed will also be raised from 15 watts."
  • Originally didn't include the last sentence.
  • The previous rumors of reverse wireless charging didn't disqualify this pick since it's in combination with Qi 2 as well. It's pointed out that Qi 2 is basically just standardized MagSafe as well, but it's still allowed as they'll have to be specific about Qi 2 to count it. Stephen still thinks it lacks passion. Later, Federico sprinkled some passion on it after all by adding a charging wattage increase after all.

picks.text: Apple calls the new camera the "Magic Telephoto"
picks.full-pick-text: Apple calls the new camera the "Magic Telephoto"
picks.notes: • Myke thinks that "periscope" is a bad name for regular people and so Apple will pick something else, and to make it risky, he has made a specific guess at the branding. He also considered "Ultra Telephoto".

picks.text: Some of the new iPhones will be more expensive in some European countries
picks.full-pick-text: Some of the new iPhones will be more expensive in some European countries

picks.text: A new AirPods case with USB-C is unveiled
picks.full-pick-text: A new AirPods case with USB-C is unveiled

picks.text: iOS 17 gets released on the week of September 18
picks.full-pick-text: iOS 17 gets released on the week of September 18

picks.text: Apple won't release any new leather accessories as part of the event announcements (including cases and watch bands)
picks.full-pick-text: Apple won't release any new leather accessories as part of the event announcements (including cases and watch bands)

picks.text: iPhone 15 gets slower-speed USB-C transfers compared to the Pro models
picks.full-pick-text: iPhone 15 gets slower-speed USB-C transfers compared to the Pro models
picks.notes: • "Compared to the Pro models" was added for clarity.

picks.text: Some iPhones will come with color-matched cables
picks.full-pick-text: Some iPhones will come with color-matched cables

picks.text: Apple Watch SE is not updated, but receives a price cut
picks.full-pick-text: Apple Watch SE is not updated, but receives a price cut

picks.text: Apple Watch Ultra 2 comes in at least 1 new finish
picks.full-pick-text: Apple Watch Ultra 2 comes in at least 1 new finish

picks.text: Apple replaces its leather iPhone cases with a new product
picks.full-pick-text: Apple replaces its leather iPhone cases with a new product

picks.text: iPhone Pro models will be equipped with Thunderbolt, but will come with a USB-C cable in the box, requiring a separate purchase of a Thunderbolt cable
picks.full-pick-text: iPhone Pro models will be equipped with Thunderbolt, but will come with a USB-C cable in the box, requiring a separate purchase of a Thunderbolt cable

picks.text: iPhone 15 and 15 Plus get an always-on display
picks.full-pick-text: iPhone 15 and 15 Plus get an always-on display

picks.text: By the time we grade these picks, our St Jude fundraiser will be over $250,000
picks.full-pick-text: By the time we grade these picks, our St Jude fundraiser will be over $250,000
picks.notes: • Stephen once again pushes the boundary of acceptable Flexie topics, possibly opening a Pandora's box for the already-chaotic game.

picks.text: The iPhone 15 Pro Max/Ultra weighs within 10% of the iPhone 14 Pro Max's weight
picks.full-pick-text: The iPhone 15 Pro Max/Ultra weighs within 10% of the iPhone 14 Pro Max's weight
picks.notes: • "The new phone will need to be between 228g - 264g, as the 14 Pro Max weighs 240g" was what was written down, but those numbers are off (there was some shuffling between 5% and 10% when debating this as a Risky pick). Ultimately it did end up being within 10%.

picks.text: New Apple Watch Ultra band style
picks.full-pick-text: New Apple Watch Ultra band style

picks.text: The Pro Max becomes the Ultra
picks.full-pick-text: The Pro Max becomes the Ultra

picks.text: Apple says they've formulated a new kind of titanium that has special properties
picks.full-pick-text: Apple says they've formulated a new kind of titanium that has special properties
picks.notes: • Apple certainly touted the properties of the titanium, but it may not have been new. Nevertheless, it's graded as correct and not delved into too deeply, and wouldn't have changed the results either way.

picks.text: Apple debuts a new style of charging accessory for the iPhone
picks.full-pick-text: Apple debuts a new style of charging accessory for the iPhone

picks.text: Apple announces new AirPods Max, featuring USB-C and made of titanium
picks.full-pick-text: Apple announces new AirPods Max, featuring USB-C and made of titanium

picks.text: Dynamic Island on all new iPhones
picks.full-pick-text: Dynamic Island on all new iPhones

picks.text: The David Guetta song doesn't play
picks.full-pick-text: The David Guetta song doesn't play
picks.notes: • "Titanium" is the song in question, of course.

picks.text: The David Guetta song plays either before or during the event
picks.full-pick-text: The David Guetta song plays either before or during the event
picks.notes: • In response to Myke's more negative pick. This possibly falls slightly afoul of the scoring window rules as it includes things before the event but is allowed, with a rule update to be implemented later.
